website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality sound level meter that is built to last and can travel with you anywhere.
pros: Easy to set up and use
Superior quality at a reasonable price
cons: Some users have said it isn't as sensitive to low-decibel sounds as it claims to be

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality decibel meter
customer_reviews.text: This decibel meter is well built. I use it to measure sounds coming from machinery at work. It does the job. Its rugid enough for field work too. Im starting to see tacklife makes some quality products. To the touch, the meter is soft and buttons are easy to use. My only complaint is that it uses a 9v battery instead of standard AA that i always have a regular stock of. I dont think i will be changing batteries often since this isnt a meter that will be heavily utilized so its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: this worked well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: i did not compare with another one side by side to see how real or on point it is, but it gave me the reading i needed outside of a structure while blasting music inside the structure.
customer_reviews.author: Shae'

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works well
customer_reviews.text: I just love this little thing. Easy to use and inexpensive as well as arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after ten minutes of use, constant lock ups, new battery did not fix.
customer_reviews.author: Thane

customer_reviews.title: Unreadable numbers
customer_reviews.text: Readings are all over the place, can't get a stable reading to know what it actually means
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Sound measurement was low by 10 dB when compared with several reverence meters
customer_reviews.text: This meter was low in all its measurements. Not worth anything.
customer_reviews.author: David Baraff

customer_reviews.title: Phone seems to be more accurate. Will update after more tests.
customer_reviews.text: My phone app shows a different reading than this and I think the phone is closer to what it should be. Im going to try a different one and see which it is closer to. Will update once I can test.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: Barely changes reading when I crank up the volume on my stereo, clearly not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: MagicJoe52

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have no negative comments. This meter was well-packed, seems very accurate compared to other consumer-grade products I have, including APPs on my phone, and does the job of occasional level checking in our church sanctuary very well. It would be nice if it provided an "averaging" function (one of my APPs does that), but I knew it wouldn't do that when I bought it and am not at all disappointed for this price. Excellent DB Meter - better than expected in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: DaveTheGeek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for minimalists
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It came with the batteries, was easy to setup and use. It's either possible to hang on the wall or put on shelves. Small, convenient and does seem like accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nora

customer_reviews.title: Okay item,  could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Okay product, but poorly dampened electronic sensor - reading jump around even in a still environment with meter set to 'slow' response.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: TACKLIFE Hygrometer, HM02 Digital Room Thermometer with Larger Backlight LCD Display, ℃/℉ Switch, MIN/MAX Records, Batteries Included, Monitor Temperature and Humidity for Home, Office,car
feature_bullets: ▲WIDE RANGE & ℃/℉ SWITHCHABLE: Measuring temperature range -50~70℃( 58.0°F - 158.0°F), accuracy ±1℃/1.8°F; measures humidity range 20% - 95% RH, accuracy ±3% RH. Change temperature display by pressing the button of "℃/℉"

▲MAX/MIN/RESET&TIME SETTINGS: The current humidity and temperature displayed, maximum and minimum humidity/temperature are recorded over the past and now; It indicates current time and date on the big sleek screen (12/24-hour settings available), also can be manually calibrated the date and time to improve data readings

▲LARGE SCREEN& BCKLIGHT: 3.5 inches backlit LCD make current humidity and temperature be legible even in the dark environment. The bright backlight makes the screen easy to read in low light when activated, and automatically turns off after 5 seconds
▲15 Ringtones & Automatic Update: Alarm clock settings with 15 Ringtones meet your acoustical feeling. Measures humidity and temperature every 30 seconds to provide updated and accurate readings

▲Extreme Data Alert Feature & Portable Design: The hygrometer will display "LL" when humidity is under 20% or exceed 95%; Adjustable tabletop and wall-mountable design, convenient mounting feature for every type of room; Small and light enough for saving space and carrying around

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
